\I[49] \c[6]Instruction Manual\c[0] Contains essential information for

name: Adventurer's Journal
note: <itemCategory:\I[810]Item>

name: Overview
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SGピクチャ:Walking_Zaraki_00>

<SG説明:Overview   Set in a world where gods exist, a young angel girl, along
with her companions, gets involved in various mysteries while
searching for her own path in life.>

name: Operation Method
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 

<SG説明: \C[6] Basic Controls \C[0]   \C[6]Clear Message Window\C[0] ...
Right-click \C[6]Run\C[0] ... Hold down Shift key and press arrow keys
\C[6]Confirm, Talk, Examine\C[0] ... Z / Enter   \C[6]Cancel/Open
Menu\C[0] ... X   \C[6]Backlog\C[0] ... Q \C[6]Return to Title
Screen\C[0] ... F5   \C[6]Skip Message\C[0] ... Ctrl  *Some events
cannot be skipped.>

name: Before going on an adventure
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明: How to Start an Adventure: - When interrupting your adventure, be
sure to save your progress on the menu screen. - You can save up to 20
save data files. However, if you choose a save data file that is
already in use, the previous record will be erased. - When finishing
the story, close the screen with Alt+F4. How to Resume an Adventure: -
From the title screen, select Continue and choose the save data file
you want to resume from.>

name: Menu Screen
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明: \C[6] There are a total of 8 menu commands \C[0] that can be used
while moving through fields, towns, dungeons, and other locations.
\C[6]■Items\C[0] Check and use the items you possess.
\C[6]■Skills\C[0] Check and use the skills you have learned.
\C[6]■Equipment\C[0] Change weapons and armor. \C[6]■Abilities\C[0]
Enhance your abilities. \C[6]■Status\C[0] Check your abilities. Only
Zerachiel's sexual experiences will be described. \C[6]■Sort\C[0]
Change the party formation or swap with reserve members.
\C[6]■Options\C[0] Change settings. \C[6]■Save\C[0] Record your
adventure. You can save anywhere.>

name: Option
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SGピクチャ:tutorial10>
<SGピクチャ拡大率:0.8>
<SG説明:>

name: Town and base appearance
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明:  \C[6] Main Facilities in Town \C[0] When you go on an adventure,
you'll discover various facilities in the town and base. There, you'll
find different facilities that will assist you in your adventure.
\C[6] Inn \C[0] This is a place where you can fully recover your
depleted HP and MP. If it's the base in Logres, there won't be any
accommodation fee. \C[6] Item Shop \C[0] They sell convenient items
such as antidotes and healing potions that you can use during your
adventure. They also buy items that you no longer need. \C[6] Weapon
and Armor Shop \C[0] This is a place where you can buy armor to
protect yourself in battle. There are also craftsmen who can modify
your equipment.>

name: Attribute
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明:  About Attributes Magic is activated by consuming elemental points
(MP). When attacked by an attribute, there is a certain probability
that abilities will decrease. [FireIcon] Fire: 50% chance of reducing
[AttackPower] to 0.7 times. [IceIcon] Ice: 50% chance of reducing
[DefensePower] to 0.7 times. [WindIcon][EarthIcon] Wind and Earth: 50%
chance of reducing [Agility] to 0.5 times. [ThunderIcon] Thunder: 25%
chance of inflicting [Seal] status ailment.>

name: Abnormal Status
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明: \C[6]Abnormal Status\C[0] There are times when abnormal statuses are
inflicted by enemy attacks. Abnormal statuses are removed at the end
of battle. \I[577]Poison: HP decreases by 7% every turn. \I[581]Sleep:
Becomes unable to act, and defense power and evasion rate become 0.
\I[579]Seal: For 2 turns, \C[6]TECHNIQUE\C[0] cannot be used.
\I[580]Confusion: Attacks regardless of friend or foe.>

name: Ability Enhancement
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明: \C[6] Strengthen your characters \C[0]. Abilities are the key to
character growth. You can acquire SP through level ups and use it to
learn abilities.  \C[6]■ Physical Training \C[0] - Increases HP.
\C[6]■ Elemental Research \C[0] - Increases MP. \C[6]■ Martial Arts
\C[0] - Increases Attack Power. Physical damage will be increased.
\C[6]■ Indomitable Spirit \C[0] - Increases Defense. Damage taken will
be reduced. \C[6]■ Magic Mastery \C[0] - Increases Magic Power. Magic
damage will be increased. \C[6]■ Magic Barrier \C[0] - Increases
Spirit. Magic damage taken will be reduced. \C[6]■ Lightning Speed
\C[0] - Increases Agility. Affects the order of actions. \C[6]■ Mind's
Eye \C[0] - Increases Critical Hit Rate. Critical hit rate will be
increased.>

name: Knowledge of Adventure
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明:When you're unsure of your objective, various mysteries and adventures
await on your journey. First, listen to what others have to say. The
key to adventure is listening to people's stories. By listening to the
stories of the people you meet along the way, you'll surely be able to
solve any puzzles or overcome any obstacles. Make sure to collect
treasure chests as they may contain powerful weapons and armor.
Equipping these items will give you an advantage in battles. Use your
abilities to enhance your skills by using SP. You may also need to
compensate for any lacking abilities.>

name: Goddess of Luck
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明:\C[6] During battle, the goddess of luck may descend upon you. \C[0]
The goddess of luck, Michelin, loves all people. At the start of
battle, she may occasionally grant her protection. During that battle,
all stats will increase and \C[6]the rate of acquiring Rill/items\C[0]
will double. However, this will not occur in battles against strong
enemies.>

name: Sexual intercourse
note:
<SGカテゴリ:Characters> 
<SG説明:\C[6] About Sexual Activities \C[0] Zerachiel sometimes allows her
body to be taken by certain enemies when she is defeated, or when she
is asked to do so. The sexual content that occurs during those times
will increase her lewd status. Although it does not affect the
progress of the game, some events require a certain level of
corruption. You can check the conditions for collecting all events in
the reminiscence room. The person who took her virginity will be
recorded as her first experience.>
